patthana15.11:1.1_0: Hetuṁ sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.11:2.1_0: Hetuṁ asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.11:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
